# NaturalWeb - Natural Language Website Interaction Platform

## Project Overview
Full-stack application enabling natural language interaction with websites through both a web application and browser extension.

## Architecture
- **Monorepo Structure**: Turborepo-based monorepo
- **Web App**: Next.js 14+ with TypeScript
- **Extension**: Cross-browser extension (Chrome/Firefox)
- **API**: Node.js/Express with NLP capabilities
- **Database**: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM
- **Deployment**: Docker, Vercel, Chrome Web Store

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all code
- Follow functional component patterns in React
- Implement proper error handling and validation
- Use Prisma for all database operations
- Share code between web app and extension via packages
- Maintain consistent styling with Tailwind CSS

## Key Features
- Natural language command processing
- Website automation and interaction
- Real-time metrics tracking
- User analytics dashboard
- Marketing insights and usage patterns
